content.text:
Hey [@kemitchell](@TqlPr31FOOCjuupH0L9HCJdLjWYySyibbKscNhgLoCo=.ed25519)! I've got two questions on the Charity license:

1. Is this basically a 0BSD + patent resolution clause? If so, I could absolutely see this overtaking the Apache license with its simple language.
2. I noticed that "my" and "I" are present in this license -- is there a separate license for organizations to use?

Good to see you active on SSB again!
